title: Make Ink UI the default runtime
description:
After BUG-024 is fixed (Ink UI auto-exits properly), change the default runtime from 'bash' to 'bun' so Ralph uses the React Ink UI by default.

Users can still switch back to bash UI via ralph-config if needed.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Update bun/core/config.ts: change default runtime from 'bash' to 'bun'
Update all default config templates to use runtime: 'bun'
Update ralph-config wizard to show 'bun' as recommended option
Update README to document Ink UI as default, bash as fallback
Test: Fresh install uses Ink UI by default
Test: ralph-config can switch back to bash
Test: Existing configs with runtime=bash still work
Commit: feat: US-107 make Ink UI the default runtime
